Feature.Name: Veteran’s Cane
Feature.Text: When you grasp this walking cane and use a bonus action to speak the command word, it transforms into an ordinary longsword and ceases to be magical.

MagicProperty.Name: Veteran’s Cane
MagicProperty.Description: When you grasp this walking cane and use a bonus action to speak the command word, it transforms into an ordinary longsword and ceases to be magical.
